channel.title: Kronic~ The Greatest At Being The Best! [PI] [Updated]
channel.description:
[img]http://img203.imageshack.us/img203/1025/kroniclogocreatedbysini.png[/img]
I created the Image its pretty awesome :P
[font=arial black][size=18pt]- Introduction - [/size][/font]
[size=10pt][font=arial]Hey! I have been working on Kronic for a while now honestly too long but I am not ready to launch it so I thought I would let you guys now and see if you could suggest things.
Firstly yes it is Project Insanity ^.^ I was using Delta but after seeing people hating on Delta i gave up and turned towards PI.
[b]The Home is Lumbridge... I have not seen Lumbridge used as a home. So I thought why not. I started coding around Lumbridge Deleting,Adding,Moving,Implanting, Objects. TBH I deleted a couple of door's not figuring out how to make them work properly but I must say when the door's are deleted it looks much neater ^.^ So i started coding Delta but after seeing how much people hated it I was afraid no one was going to join the server so instead i stopped and went after Project Insanity I must say there is a huge,huge change. I first started coding Savvier,James was a global moderator on that, but we then decided to quit that project and open up Kronic - Project Kronic. Since last month we have been working on Kronic, James has mostly been working on the Forum's,when I was working on the server. I will be updating what I have done. Not only will it entertain you,I hope, but it will also help me to keep track since i forgot a lot of things :P. [u][b][color=green]Remember to check back on this topic because it does get updated![/color][/b][/u][/b] [/font][/size]
[b]I have added a portal to Slayer tower not excatly a portal but it stands up.. If you catch my drift :P [/b]
James and I created the official Kronic website but at the moment we can't post it so contact me at shamil_gunak@hotmail.com or James at IxJamesxI@live.ca
[b]Workers -
Ara - Me [Owner]
Ix Soulcist xI - James [Owner][/b]
---------------------------------------
[size=24pt][color=green]Client --[/size]
Well towards the client I have changed the "Item List" or what ever it is to Forum's So instead of launching the Item list it will launch the Forum's I also added Donate,Vote... Which is not a big deal not a hard task to pull of.
[Update] November 24th 12:25am
I am working on the Log-In interface i must say it is hard not just the images but figuring it out through client.java,etc.
[Update] November 25th 11:25am
Added the runescape log in bars. So there gold or yellow,etc and they light up when you go over them. <3
[b] Some Media I promise[/b]
[img]http://img401.imageshack.us/img401/5908/46476239.png[/img]
[size=18pt]This is the Kronic Points Exchange I also added Dragon Claws in here.[/size]
[img]http://img228.imageshack.us/img228/5612/40025706.png[/img]
[size=18pt][u][b]Please Comment Suggestions,etc Give me some ideas! ^.^ This post is always being updated.[/b][/u][/size]

item.title: Kronic~ The Greatest At Being The Best! [PI] [Updated]
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Eh… In my opinion, the forum’s are better than the server. I’m not going to even be active on the server.

Thanks for the support though. I’ll soon get verification for the forum’s so I can have Viva had the link.

Read full topic
